status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cj2le","text":"Use a primer with a HEAD to make amplicons, as in a regular procedure. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ft27","text":"Enzymes with or without proofreading can be used, and purification is not necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1bg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88qsg","text":"Mix the following materials in order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"169s4","text":"(10 samples as an example)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"247l7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv42g","text":"#MaterialQuantity1Sterile water7 ul2T4 Polynucleotide Kinase Reaction Buffer2 ul3T4 Polynucleotide Kinase1 ul4PCR product (x10 samples)10 ul","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":140}],"data":{}},{"key":"l0q3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"665rs","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold  "},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold  "},"B_2":{"className":" "},"B_3":{"className":" "},"B_4":{"className":" "}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["326","204"],"data":[["Sterile water","7 ul"],["10X T4 Polynucleotide Kinase Reaction Buffer (with 1 mM ATP)","2 ul"],["T4 Polynucleotide Kinase (10U/ul)","1 ul"],["PCR product (x10 samples)","1 ul x 10 samples = 10 ul"]],"guid":"D94354E7D48C11EDB7650A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ccguh","text":"Note: Some manufacturers' buffers require additional ATP to be added to achieve a final reaction concentration of 0.1 mM.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Sterile water","7 ul"],["10X T4 Polynucleotide Kinase Reaction Buffer (with 1 mM ATP)","2 ul"],["T4 Polynucleotide Kinase (10U/ul)","1 ul"],["PCR product (x10 samples)","1 ul x 10 samples = 10 ul"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg1ss","text":"Order the following two primers:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cia70","text":"Adapter_top: TTTTTTTTCCTGTACTTCGTTCAGTTACGTATTGCT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9c68","text":"Adapter_bottom: GCAATACGTAACTGAACGAAGTACAGG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clif1","text":"Preferably, choose OPC or a higher level of purification method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2pjg0","text":"Dilute both primers to 100uM according to the manufacturer's instructions ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lm0n","text":"(TE buffer is recommended)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bf2uv","text":"Mix both primers together in equal volumes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drana","text":"(Now it is 50 uM)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8q4a8","text":"Incubate the mixture in a dry bath at 95°C for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b730r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7ftt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d952g","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8kqlk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F27CB920D61911ED8CA5C59A0A451B67","height":131,"id":379091,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"8sjk7\",\"text\":\"Ideally, Adapter_top and Adapter_bottom would aneal to form a sticky end of double strand DNA\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mugxbx4qx.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mugvbx4qx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mugwbx4qx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mugubx4qx.webp","width":531}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a3bb9","text":"Allow the mixture to slowly cool to room temperature for one hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fbsr","text":"Make 1:10 dilution (5 uM)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff7u4","text":"Store the mixture at 4°C or in a freezer for long-term storage. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ee24","text":"When necessary, divide the mixture into smaller portions to avoid repeated thawing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":60,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7f73a","text":"Purify the PCR product and adjust the final concentration of the purified DNA to ~50 ng/ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cc1d","text":"Use a barcoding index for the second PCR. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73vok","text":"Note: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2de5s","text":"1. non-proofreading enzyme (Taq) must be used to add a A tail to the PCR product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":45}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7kkjv","text":"Purify the DNA and adjust the final concentration to ~50 ng/ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qop6","text":"Mix the following materials in order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5run","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ifif","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7nlk2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["300","256"],"data":[["5' Phosphorylated PCR product (50ng/ul)","10 ul"],["Sterile water","7 ul"],["10X T4 DNA Ligase Buffer (with 1 mM ATP)","2 ul"],["Adapter","0.1 ul"],["T4 ligase","1 ul \n(300U or 2.5U in Weiss Unit)"]],"guid":"8A849530D48F11ED8DFBC38BBA193F40","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c0o6q","text":"Note: Some manufacturers' buffers require additional ATP to be added to achieve a final reaction concentration of 0.1 mM.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["5' Phosphorylated PCR product (50ng/ul)","10 ul"],["Sterile water","7 ul"],["10X T4 DNA Ligase Buffer (with 1 mM ATP)","2 ul"],["Adapter","0.1 ul"],["T4 ligase","1 ul \n(300U or 2.5U in Weiss Unit)"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
